reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent professor! Her lectures are clear, and she's always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Decent teacher, but his lectures can be a bit dry. However, he's very knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Great professor, very passionate about the subject. Sometimes goes too fast though.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Not very engaging. The class felt more like a reading session than a lecture.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Fantastic teacher! She makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Good professor, but sometimes hard to follow. His exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Very interesting lectures. She encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: The content is difficult, and he doesn't explain it well.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging and insightful lectures. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking classes. Sometimes goes off-topic, but overall good.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Average professor. Lectures are okay, but nothing special.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Amazing professor! Her passion for literature is contagious.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Good teacher, but sometimes his examples are too technical.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Not very engaging. Lectures are mostly just reading from slides.

reviews.subject: Business
reviews.review: Great professor! His real-world examples make the class very interesting.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: The material is challenging, but she tries to help students understand.

reviews.subject: Computer Engineering
reviews.review: Good lectures, but his assignments are very difficult.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Excellent professor! She brings in a lot of industry experience.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: The lectures are too fast-paced, and he doesn't explain things well.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Very knowledgeable and approachable. The class was enjoyable.
